title: Bad Company - Hard Rock Live [320k MP3]
description:
Bad Company - Hard Rock Live. One of the most acclaimed bands of the Classic Rock era, Bad Company put their indelible stamp on Rock 'n' Roll with the creation of some of the most timeless Rock anthems of all time. This special sold-out show saw the legendary supergroup reform for their first performance together in nearly a decade, featuring the original founding line-up of vocalist Paul Rodgers (Free, Queen), guitarist Mick Ralphs (Mott The Hoople) and drummer Simon Kirke (Free). Aptly filmed at Hollywood's Hard Rock Live on 08-08-08, this remarkable reunion showcases all of the band's multi-platinum hits including 'Can't Get Enough', 'Feel Like Makin Love' and 'Rock Steady'.

01. Bad Company
02. Honey Child
03. Burnin' Sky
04. Gone, Gone, Gone
05. Run with the Pack
06. Live for the Music
07. Seagull
08. Feel Like Makin' Love
09. Movin' On
10. Simple Man
11. Rock Steady
12. Shooting Star
13. Can't Get Enough
14. Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy
15. Ready for Love
16. Good Lovin' Gone Bad
